languages.text: {n}Владайм сжимает губы в нитку.{/n} "Бывали в моей молодости самые разные ситуации... В том числе отчаянные. Эту крысу не раз загоняли в угол. Но из каждого угла она выбиралась, сполна отведав плоти охотника. Уверяю, что не намерен изменять старым принципам".

{n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."
languages.original_text: {n}Владайм сжимает губы в нитку.{/n} "Бывали в моей молодости самые разные ситуации... В том числе отчаянные. Эту крысу не раз загоняли в угол. Но из каждого угла она выбиралась, сполна отведав плоти охотника. Уверяю, что не намерен изменять старым принципам".

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym's tightly pressed lips are thread-thin.{/n} "I've been in all kinds of situations when I was young. Including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once. Only to get out of every corner with its stomach full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

Only to get out of every corner with its stomach full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

Only to get out of every corner with its stomach full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

{n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

languages.text: {n}弗拉迪姆将嘴唇紧紧地抿成了一条线。{/n}“我年轻的时候，经历过各种各样的事情……也有很多次走投无路。我这只老鼠不止一次被逼到绝境，但我每次都能逃出来，肚子里装满了猎人的血肉。我可以向您保证，我无意违背我的原则。”
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

traits.locale_text: {n}弗拉迪姆将嘴唇紧紧地抿成了一条线。{/n}“我年轻的时候，经历过各种各样的事情……也有很多次走投无路。我这只老鼠不止一次被逼到绝境，但每次都能逃出来，装着一肚子猎人的肉。我可以向您保证，我无意违背我的原则。”

languages.text: {n}ヴラダイムは唇を細く噛みしめた。{/n}「若い頃は、色々な事を経験してきた…希望のない状況もあった。このドブネズミはな、何度も追い詰められていて、その度ハンターの肉を腹いっぱい食って抜け出してきた。古い伝統は破らないと、宣言する」
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴラダイムは糸のように薄い唇を噛みしめた。{/n}「若い頃は、色々な事を経験してきた…希望のない状況もあった。このドブネズミはな、何度も追い詰められていてその度ハンターの肉を腹いっぱい食って抜け出してきた。古い伝統は破らないと、宣言する」

languages.text: {n}Vladaym aprieta los labios en una fina línea.{/n} «En mi juventud viví muchas cosas... Incluso situaciones desesperadas. Esta rata ha sido acorralada más de una vez, solo para salir de cada esquina con el estómago lleno de la carne de su cazador. Le aseguro que no tengo intención de renegar de mis principios».
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los labios apretados de Vladaym son con como un hilo fino.{/n} «En mi juventud viví muchas cosas... Incluso situaciones desesperadas. Esta rata ha sido acorralada más de una vez, solo para salir de cada esquina con el estómago lleno de la carne de su cazador. Le aseguro que no tengo intención de renegar de mis principios».

languages.text: {n}Vladayms presst seine Lippen fest zusammen.{/n} "Ich habe in jungen Jahren allerlei Situationen erlebt ... Auch verzweifelte. Diese Ratte wurde schon mehr als einmal in die Ecke gedrängt. Und sie ist aus jeder Ecke wieder herausgekommen, den Magen voll mit dem Fleisch ihrer Jäger. Ich versichere Euch, ich habe nicht vor, meine alten Grundsätze aufzugeben."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladayms fest zusammengepresste Lippen sind dünn wie Garn.{/n} "Ich habe in jungen Jahren allerlei Situationen erlebt ... Auch verzweifelte. Diese Ratte wurde schon mehr als einmal in die Ecke gedrängt. Und sie ist aus jeder Ecke wieder herausgekommen, den Magen voll mit dem Fleisch ihrer Jäger. Ich versichere Euch, ich habe nicht vor, meine alten Grundsätze aufzugeben."

languages.text: {n}Les lèvres serrées, Vladaym garde le silence un long moment,{/n} « Quand j'étais jeune, je me suis retrouvé dans toutes sortes de situations, dont certaines semblaient désespérées de prime abord. Le rat que je suis s'est fait acculer plus d'une fois, mais il a toujours réussi à s'en sortir, le ventre rempli de la chair de son chasseur. Je peux vous assurer que je n'ai aucune intention de changer mes vieilles habitudes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym pince les lèvres avec force.{/n} « Vous savez, quand j'étais jeune, je me suis retrouvé dans toutes sortes de situations, dont certaines semblaient désespérées de prime abord. Le rat que je suis s'est fait acculer plus d'une fois, mais il a toujours réussi à s'en sortir, l'estomac rempli de la chair de son chasseur. Je peux vous assurer que je n'ai aucune intention de changer mes vieilles habitudes. »

languages.text: {n}Vladaym'ın iki dudağı bir çizgide buluşuyor.{/n} "Gençliğimde türlü vaziyetlere düştüğüm oldu... çaresizlik dâhil. Bu sıçan ilk kez köşeye sıkışmıyor yani. Ama o köşeden avcısını yutup tok karınla kaçar hep. Köklü ilkelerimden vazgeçmek gibi bir niyetim yok, emin olun."
languages.original_text: {n}Vladaym's presses his lips into a thin line.{/n} "I got into all manner of situations when I was a young man... including desperate ones. This rat has been cornered more than once before. But it always got out of that corner with its belly full of its hunter's flesh. I assure you I have no intention of reneging on my old principles."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vladaym'ın iki dudağı bir çizgide buluşuyor.{/n} "Gençliğimde türlü vaziyetlere düştüğüm oldu... çaresizlik dâhil. Bu sıçan ilk kez köşeye sıkışmıyor yani. Ama o köşeden avcısını yutup tok karınla kaçar hep. Köklü ilkelerimden vazgeçmek gibi bir niyetim yok, emin olun."
